subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh defenseman Ryan Whitney will be out for at least three months after surgery to correct a chronic problem with his left foot. He had 12 goals and 28 assists last season, when the Penguins reached the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Pittsburgh defenseman Ryan Whitney will be out for at least three months after surgery to correct a chronic problem with his left foot. He had 12 goals and 28 assists last season, when the Penguins reached the Stanley Cup finals.
